rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Small space for reception and storage near the entrance; includes a closet.

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchenette
rooms.description: Open plan living area combined with kitchenette. The layout promotes social interaction while remaining budget-friendly.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A central open space that provides natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles; serves as a communal living area.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Compact, multi-functional gym space equipped for basic workout routines. Fitted with budget-friendly gym equipment.

rooms.name: Storeroom/Bathroom
rooms.description: Utility room that includes storage and bathroom facilities; designed to be multifunctional on a tight budget.

openings.notes: Large entrance providing ample space for movement in keeping with traditional Chettinad aesthetics.
Provides natural light and ventilation to the living room/kitchenette area.
Serves as transitional space between interior and courtyard; aligns with Vastu principles.

additional_details.budget_considerations: The design uses minimalistic finishes and multi-purpose spaces to adhere to a tight budget. Where possible, cost-effective local materials have been selected.
additional_details.vastu_principles: Design incorporates a central courtyard that enhances natural lighting, ventilation, and positive energy flow. The positioning of rooms is aligned with traditional Vastu guidelines.
